description: Bicycling is one of the oldest past times in recent history. Since it's invention, the bike has been used to transport, race, and please those it carries. Today cycling is seen as an archaic chore indulged only by children and athletes. Does the bicycle have a place in your lifestyle? The answer is yes! Did you know that biking is as intense a workout as running, or that it is better for your joints than walking? It's true. The simple mechanics of a bicycle allow for great cardiovascular activity at a fraction of the physical strain of sports. Whether you are already a biker and are looking for tips to improve your form, or have never biked for exercise, the Cycling for Life ebook is your complete guide to everything that is biking. Mountain, road, or racing being a cyclist is fun. Download your new love for cycling today!
